source_sentence: 寶星陀羅尼經卷第九
translation: Jeweled Star Dhāraṇī Sutra, Volume 9

source_sentence: 唐天竺三藏波羅頗蜜多羅譯
translation: Tang translation of the Tripiṭaka of the Indian Sanskrit, translated by Prabhūtaratna

source_sentence: 擁護品之餘
translation: the rest of the chapter on embracing

source_sentence: 「◎唯置作五逆者、誹謗正法者、謗無賢聖者，身口意業所作之惡業及果報，
translation: â€œOnly those who commit the five heinous crimes, denigrate the right teaching, and denigrate the absence of goodness and nobleness will be subject to bad actions and results created by physical, verbal, and mental actions.

source_sentence: 一切皆滅。
translation: All of them will cease.

source_sentence: 若此法門乃至經卷，若但書持置於宅中，彼等所有諸業煩惱，能為障礙量等須彌，
translation: If this teaching or even a scripture is simply written and stored in the house, all their actions and afflictions can be as great an obstacle as Mount Sumeru.

source_sentence: 皆悉消滅。
translation: They all disappear.

source_sentence: 一切善根悉得增長，一切善分皆悉滿足，意所悕望皆悉成就，身口意善悉當增長。
translation: All good roots will grow, all good parts will be fulfilled, all the expectations of the mind will be fulfilled, and all goodness of body, speech, and thought will grow.

source_sentence: 一切惡見斷滅無餘，一切怨敵以法調伏。
translation: All bad views are eliminated without remainder, and all enemies are subdued by the Dharma.

source_sentence: 一切微細寂滅之道悉當得入，以此一切諸佛世尊所共護持大集陀羅尼法門加護力故。
translation: All the subtle paths to cessation will all be entered because of the protective power of the great collection of dhāraṇī teachings that are shared by all the buddhas and world-honored ones.

source_sentence: 「隨所有國此陀羅尼法門當流行地，能令彼地肥膩精味倍上成就，美果妙味當得增長，
translation: “According to the countries where this dhāraṇī teaching will spread, they’ll be able to cause the flavor of that land’s fat and greasy semen to double, and its delicious fruit and subtle taste will grow.

source_sentence: 苦辛惡味當得遠離，華果財穀色類成就，倉庫貯器悉皆增滿，衣服飲食湯藥所用倍勝增多，
translation: Their storehouses and containers will all become full, and their clothing, food, drink, bathing water, and medicine will all be doubled.

source_sentence: 由法力故。
translation: It's because of the power of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 「若有眾生受彼飲食者，當得無病顏色成就，氣力強健憶念堅固，樂求善法遠離諸惡。
translation: If there are sentient beings who accept that food and drink, they'll attain the accomplishment of illnesslessness, appearance, energy, strength, recollection, and firmness, which will delight in seeking good qualities and be free of evil.

source_sentence: 彼諸眾生若命終已，當生汝等種類之中，眷屬增長勢力具足怨不能壞，
translation: If those sentient beings die, they'll be born among your types, with their retinues growing in strength and full of enemies that won't break down.

source_sentence: 以法力故，當得四姓之所擁護，當以法義共相示誨。
translation: Because of the power of the Dharma, they'll be protected by the four castes, and they'll be taught together in terms of the meaning of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 汝等若能如是作者，即為供養一切三世諸佛世尊已。」
translation: If you can do so, then you'll make offerings to all the world-honored buddhas of the three times.

source_sentence: 爾時，曼陀香如來即依諸佛清淨境界智慧音聲隨類句義，以一切諸佛世尊語悉滿此剎，
translation: At that time the Buddha Mandhātu perfumed all these buddha-lands with the voices, words, and meanings of wisdom emanating from the pure realm of enlightened ones.

source_sentence: 遍告此佛剎中一切諸菩薩摩訶薩，及釋主、梵主、摩呼羅伽主所有居此佛剎者，
translation: He told all the great enlightening beings in this buddha-field, as well as the lords of the gods Indra, Brahmā, Brahma, and mahoraga, who lived in this buddha-field.

source_sentence: 倍復加勸此四天下中所居住者：「汝等應當住持開示此諸佛語大集法門，
translation: Doubly, he also encouraged the inhabitants of these four continents, You should preserve and show this teaching of the great collection of Buddha-teachings.

source_sentence: 擁護此經微妙正法。」
translation: They will embrace the subtle and true teaching of this sūtra.

source_sentence: 爾時，眾中九萬七千俱胝得忍諸菩薩摩訶薩，彌勒為首，居此佛剎者，
translation: At that time, ninety-seven thousand koṭis of the great bodhisattva mahāsattvas who had attained patience in the midst of the assembly, led by Maitreya, lived in this buddha-stage.

source_sentence: 一切同聲作如是言：「我等今者奉諸佛教，為欲供養一切三世諸如來故，
translation: They all said in unison, “We now revere the buddhas’ teachings because we want to honor and serve all the buddhas of past, present, and future.

source_sentence: 於此一切諸佛世尊微妙法門，恭敬頂戴尊重如佛，悲愍成熟諸眾生故，
translation: In all these buddhas, world-honored ones, the subtle teachings of the Teaching are honored and venerated like buddhas because they compassionately mature sentient beings.

source_sentence: 乃至安置無上道故。
translation: It's because he places them in the unsurpassed path.

source_sentence: 「我等於諸聚落城邑州縣國土王宮諸寂靜處，以此法門廣布顯示，為欲成熟諸眾生故，
translation: “In order to develop sentient beings, we spread this teaching throughout the towns, cities, provinces, states, kingdoms, palaces, and other peaceful places.

source_sentence: 令此妙法得久住故。」
translation: It's because it causes this wonderful dharma to abide for a long time.

source_sentence: 爾時，一切諸佛世尊來此剎者，咸作是言：「善哉，善哉！
translation: At that point, all the buddhas and world-honored ones who came to this place all said, Good, good!

source_sentence: 汝等如是作所應作。」
translation: You thus do what you should do.

source_sentence: 是時，一切釋梵摩呼羅伽主等居此土者，并餘來眾六十四俱胝那由他等大精味中有大威德眾生，
translation: At the time, all the Śākya Brahmakāyika lords and so forth who lived in this land, as well as the other sentient beings with such great energy flavors as these sixty-four koṭis of myriad tathānas containing

source_sentence: 一切同聲，作如是言：「我等於此微妙大集法門悉當受持，乃至廣為開示顯說，
translation: They all spoke together in unison, saying: We will preserve this teaching of the subtle great compiled doctrine and explain it for you.

source_sentence: 成熟眾生故，妙法久住故，樂法聽法者悉當擁護。
translation: Because it matures sentient beings and the wonderful Dharma abides for a long time, those who delight in the Dharma and listen to the Dharma will all be protected.

source_sentence: 「我等今者，奉諸佛教，隨此法門流行之處，令使一切鬪諍違背，謀計諍論，
translation: “Now we follow the teachings of Buddhism, following the popularity of this doctrine, so that all disputes and controversies may be prevented.

source_sentence: 飢儉荒亂，他方怨敵，非時風雨，非時寒熱，苦辛澁味，惡人惡物悉當消滅。
translation: They suffer from hunger, thirst, and destitution. Enemies are attacked by other enemies; unseasonably wind and rainstorms blow at the wrong time and there is cold and heat at the wrong time. The taste of bitterness

source_sentence: 安隱快樂豐饒和合，悉當成就此妙正法當令久住，倍加勤勇擁護供給正法國王，
translation: peaceful, blissful, abundant, and harmonious, they will all perfect this marvelous right teaching, make it long-abiding, and doubly increase their diligence and courage to embrace and provide for the king of righteousness

source_sentence: 及以勤修禪定眾生悉當擁護。」
translation: All sentient beings who diligently cultivate meditation will be protected.

source_sentence: 時，彼一切諸佛世尊同聲讚言：「善哉，善哉！
translation: All those buddhas and world-honored ones then praised it with one voice, saying, Good, good!

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝等今者應如是作，勤作自他利益之事，即於一切三世諸佛為供養已。
translation: You should now do so, diligently doing things for the benefit of self and others, that is, having made offerings to all the buddhas of the three times.

source_sentence: 如汝等勤勞成熟諸眾生故，令此妙法得久住故，汝等皆當速得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。」
translation: If you diligently ripen sentient beings and cause this wonderful dharma to abide for a long time, you will all quickly attain unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 爾時，中四天下釋梵天主，乃至摩呼羅伽主，及大威德中最上首者，一切悉皆從坐而起，
translation: At that time, the lord of the Brahma heavens in the four quarters of the earth, as well as the lord of Mahāraga and the supreme leader of great splendor, all rose from their seats.

source_sentence: 恭敬合掌，作如是言：「我等亦奉一切諸佛世尊教故，悉共光顯此妙正法擁護住持，
translation: They joined their palms in respect and said: We also honor all the buddhas taught by the world-honored ones. Together we together manifest this sublime true doctrine, uphold it, and preserve it.

source_sentence: 及此大集一切諸佛所護陀羅尼印法門，當如法受。
translation: And this great collection of the dhāraṇī mudrās and dharma-gates guarded by all the buddhas will be received according to the teaching.

source_sentence: 「乃至於諸聚落、城邑、州縣、國土、王宮諸寂靜處，當廣開示，持妙法人擁護供給。
translation: “Even in villages, cities, states, prefectures, kingdoms, palaces, and other quiet places they should be extensively instructed to support the offerings of those who uphold marvelous practices.

source_sentence: 所有住信正法法師及聽法者，比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷，善男子、善女人信受此法，
translation: Those who abide in faith in the true teaching and those who listen to it—monks, bhikṣuṇīs, nuns, laymen, and laywomen—good men and good women—should believe this teaching.

source_sentence: 乃至若但書寫經卷置之家中，勤修禪定，我等於彼擁護供給種種供養，
translation: Even if we merely write fascicles of scriptures and leave them at home, diligently practicing meditation, we will protect and offer various offerings to them.

source_sentence: 衣服飲食、華蓋幢幡、塗香末香，乃至一切醫藥資具，諸有所須善作供給。
translation: They provide clothing, food and drink, flowers, canopies, banners, pennants, ointments, powdered incense, and all the necessities for medicine.

source_sentence: 「若人能於此妙法門，誦時讀時開示說時，我等自往彼法座所，為聽法故如大師想，
translation: “Suppose someone were to recite this wonderful teaching of the Dharma, and when he recites it, reads it, and explains it, we ourselves would go to that seat of the Dharma for the sake of listening to the teaching, just as a great teacher

source_sentence: 於此法門恭敬尊重一心讚歎，諸蓋幢幡持以供養。
translation: With respect and veneration for this teaching, they wholeheartedly praised it, holding canopies, banners, and streamers to offer as an offering.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is it so?

source_sentence: 我等於此一切諸佛之所擁護陀羅尼法門廣開示時，以法味故當得精氣，
translation: When we expound this extensive teaching of the dhāraṇī-dharma-gate embraced by all the buddhas, we will attain energy because of the flavor of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 具足力，具足精進，具足志，具足念，具足智，具足善友，具足眷屬，
translation: They are endowed with power, energy, zeal, determination, mindfulness, knowledge, good companions, and retinues.

source_sentence: 具足所有軍眾，怨不能壞。
translation: They are fully armed and can't be destroyed by enemies.

source_sentence: 是故我等令一切國界所有鬪諍謀計言訟，飢儉疾病他方怨賊，非時風雨極寒極熱災旱愆時，
translation: That is why we ordered all the kingdoms and territories to be free of disputes, hatred, dissipation, famine, illness, enemies, and thieves. At times of ungodly wind, rain, cold, heat, dro

source_sentence: 惡夢惡相麁澁無膩苦辛惡味，惡人、惡物諸不善分悉當消滅，倍復安隱豐熟喜樂，
translation: Bad dreams, bad appearances, tastelessness, greasiness, unpleasantness, bitterness, and bad taste will all be eliminated, and bad people and bad things will all cease, doubling back to peace and abundant joy and happiness

source_sentence: 無病和合悉當成就。
translation: Without illness, the combination will all be accomplished.

source_sentence: 「時風時雨，寒熱以時，晝夜位分半月一月，時節年歲悉令正行，諸宿星曜日月之次不令失度，
translation: “The seasons are windy and rainy, the seasons are cold and hot, and the days and nights are divided into a fortnight and a month. The seasons and years cause all to move in proper motion; the constellations, stars,

source_sentence: 泉池陂河皆令滿足，隨有眾生所依住處，瀑水漂溺我皆遮斷不令覆沒。
translation: The springs, ponds, and rivers all make them complete, and whatever sentient beings live wherever they are, the water that floats and drowns me will be shielded and eliminated and not submerged.

source_sentence: 我等於彼國邑聚落利眾生故，所有枝葉華果根莖諸穀藥味，悉當肥膩色相鮮澤美味滋多，
translation: In order to benefit sentient beings, we will produce all the branches, leaves, flowers, fruits, roots, stems, grains, herbs, and flavors of those lands. They will all be fat, greasy, colorful, fresh

source_sentence: 財穀藥味衣服莊嚴諸資具等，令諸眾生悉當具足無所減少。
translation: Wealth, grain, medicine, flavors, clothing, adornments, and other necessities will cause sentient beings to be fully endowed without any decrease.

source_sentence: 「彼諸眾生求善根心離諸惡業，勝福德聚，及彼壽命悉令成就。
translation: “Those sentient beings who seek good roots and are free of bad actions in their minds, the superior stock of merit and their life span will all be accomplished.

source_sentence: 所有聚落國土，以此一切諸佛之所擁護陀羅尼法門開示，乃至書寫經卷安置家中，
translation: In all the villages and lands, they were taught this teaching of the dhāraṇī-dharma-gate embraced by all the buddhas, up to the point where they wrote scriptures in fascicles and placed them in their homes.

source_sentence: 若讀若誦恭敬供養，於置經處。
translation: Whether he reads or recites it, he venerates and makes offerings to it and places it in a place where it's stored.

source_sentence: 若有剎利灌頂之王，我當擁護供給所須令無所乏，所無利益當為彼等而除斷之，
translation: If there are any kṣatriya kings, I will protect and provide for their needs so that they do not lack anything. For their sake I will rid them of all unbeneficial things.

source_sentence: 所有利益當為彼等隨而與之。
translation: All the benefits will be given to them for their sake.

source_sentence: 一切災怪驚動不吉，惡見惡作為惡所持，惡願惡歸奸詐讚撽，幻諂妄語嫉妬瞋忿，
translation: All the calamities and monsters are terrifying, inauspicious, bad views take evil as an evil support, bad vows of evil return, adultery, hypocrisy, flattery, false speech, jealousy, anger

source_sentence: 諸慳悋等悉當消滅，正見正道直信調伏一心慚愧，如是等法悉當示誨。
translation: Such things as stinginess and so forth will all cease, right view and right path, direct faith and discipline, one-pointedness and shame, and such things will all be taught.

source_sentence: 「妃后、內宮、宰相、輔臣，主藏親族刑罰官將，一切人民、四姓男女、童男、童女等，
translation: The queen, the inner palace, the chancellor, the ministers, the lord of the treasury, their relatives, the officials in charge of punishment, all the people, men and women of the four castes, boys and girls

source_sentence: 亦當擁護供給乃至慚愧示誨。
translation: They should also embrace and offer support, even to the point where they are shameful and admonish.

source_sentence: 所在諸方，乃至四足，亦當擁護。
translation: Wherever they are, even the four feet will also be embraced.

source_sentence: 隨有國土以此法門宣布開示，乃至書寫經卷及經卷住處，以大勤勇彼諸眾生悉當擁護，
translation: In all those lands where scriptures are written or where scriptures are preserved by means of this teaching they will be protected by the great heroic effort of all living beings.

source_sentence: 此妙正法隨處光顯不令隱沒，我等當起精進力故，作如是事。」
translation: This wonderful right teaching follows the light everywhere and doesn't allow it to be hidden, so we will give rise to the power of effort to do such things.

source_sentence: 是時，一切諸佛世尊，悉共稱讚諸善丈夫：「善哉，善哉！
translation: All the buddhas and world-honored ones then praised the good men together, Good, good!

source_sentence: 諸善男子！
translation: “O sons of the virtuous!

source_sentence: 汝等如是作所應作，以此正法及三寶種，不令隱沒故作勤勞。
translation: You should thus do what you should do, and with this right teaching and the seeds of the three treasures, you won't cause them to be hidden and therefore work hard.

source_sentence: 汝等如是，如汝所作，即於一切三世諸佛為供養已。」
translation: You are thus, just as you did, having made offerings to all the buddhas of the three times.

source_sentence: ◎◎寶星陀羅尼經護正法品第十一爾時，世尊釋迦如來告諸大眾、釋梵天王、毘樓勒叉、毘樓博叉、提頭賴吒、毘沙門等：「諸善男子！
translation: At that time the World-Honored One Śākyamuni Tathāgata addressed the great assembly of monks and nuns:

source_sentence: 我以大悲愍眾生故，於此五濁穢惡佛剎難得法時，願得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: Because of my great compassion for sentient beings, I wish to attain unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment when the Dharma is difficult to attain in these five turbid and bad buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 是中眾生墮無明闇，煩惱怨賊奸狡惱害，我為眾生滅煩惱故，退諸魔黨建立法幢，
translation: These sentient beings will fall into the darkness of ignorance and be harmed by afflictions, enemies, bandits, thieves, and crooked men. For the sake of these sentient beings’ cessation of afflictions

source_sentence: 無量眾生諸苦解脫，雨大法雨退俱胝魔。
translation: Measureless sentient beings are liberated from suffering, raining the great dharma rain and retreating from the Kauṇḍinya Māra.

source_sentence: 「諸善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 是故我今以此妙法，慇懃付囑汝等手中，如此十方無量世界，過數過量諸佛世尊，
translation: Therefore, I now entrust this wonderful teaching to you in your hands. Such are the infinite worlds of the ten directions, more numerous than the buddhas and world-honored ones.

source_sentence: 及諸菩薩摩訶薩等普來集者，以此金剛法等因緣法心建立一切法摧碎陀羅尼印句門記法門，
translation: And the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and so forth, who came to this universal assembly, established the dharma-gate of the Dhāraṇī of Destruction of All Truths by means of the mind of the teaching of the Dharma

source_sentence: 擁護佛土并諸地味眾生所居者。
translation: He who embraces the Buddha's land and the tastes of the earth and where sentient beings live.

source_sentence: 諸過惡消滅故，成熟眾生故，一切不善業盡無餘故，三寶種久住故，乃至一切佛事成就故，
translation: Because all bad actions are exhausted without remainder, because the seeds of the three treasures abide for a long time, up to the accomplishment of all Buddha-works.

source_sentence: 是故汝等受持擁護我妙正法，能令善根福行增長。
translation: That's why you should accept and embrace my wonderful right teaching, which will cause good roots and meritorious actions to grow.

source_sentence: 「若溫誦教示為他說，授趣三歸依優婆塞護住淨梵行，諸善根等福行增長；
translation: “If one warmly recites the scripture and teaches it to others, instructs lay Buddhist practitioners who have entered the path of the three refuges to abide in pure and genuine religious practice, and develops good deeds

source_sentence: 若修初禪福行增長，乃至修滅受想定；
translation: When cultivating the good conduct of the first trance, it increases up to when cultivating the concentration of cessation of feeling and perception.

source_sentence: 若須陀洹果，乃至佛菩提果福行善根，如是等相皆得增長，現在所作乃至未來當作然妙法燈，
translation: If it's the fruit of stream entry, or even the fruit of Buddhahood, enlightenment, merit, good roots, and goodness, such characteristics all grow, and whatever they do in the present will be made into a wonderful lamp of the Dharma

source_sentence: 能令一切福行增長，是故付囑汝等手中。
translation: They can cause all good deeds to grow, so they're entrusted to you in your hands.

source_sentence: 如來所覺妙法令熾然故，勸發汝等福德增長，是故付囑汝等手中。
translation: Because the Tathāgata's marvelous teaching that he perceives is so blazing, he encourages you to increase your merit and therefore entrusts it to you.

source_sentence: 「若未來世於此法門，乃至書寫經卷安置家中，以法力故，一切惡業悉當滅盡。
translation: In the future, if someone writes a sūtra and places it in their home because of this teaching, all bad actions will cease because of the power of the teaching.

source_sentence: 隨所有處，若在村城，若欲受持，當淨洗身著新淨衣，以華布散燒種種香，
translation: Wherever you are, if you're in a village or city, and if you want to receive and uphold it, you should wash your body cleanly, put on fresh, pure clothing, spread it with flowers, and burn various kinds of incense.

source_sentence: 敷種種氈褥，嚴師子座，開示此法、說此法門，乃至書寫經卷受持讀誦。
translation: He spread out various kinds of blankets and mattresses, adorned himself with a lion's seat, taught this teaching, explained this teaching, and even wrote sūtras in scrolls to memorize and recite it.

source_sentence: 爾時，有魔名曰不去——曾於佛所極多供養，於三寶中淨信不動，得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記——作大仙人形從坐而起，
translation: At the time, there was a demon named Not Going Away-someone who had made so many offerings to the Buddha and had pure faith in the Three Treasures that they didn't budge and attained assurance of unsurpassed, correct enlight

source_sentence: 於釋迦如來前合掌，遍觀如來，世尊威力加故，於一切佛剎大聲遍滿，
translation: He joined his palms in front of the Buddha Śākyamuni Tathāgata and looked all over him, observing that the World-honored One’s mighty voice filled all buddha-lands with a loud sound.

source_sentence: 作如是言：「諸佛世尊一心念我，一切菩薩摩訶薩，及天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿修羅、伽樓羅、緊那羅、摩呼羅伽、人、非人等，

source_sentence: 魔及眷屬聽我所說。
translation: Māra and his followers will listen to what I teach.

source_sentence: 今此世尊釋迦牟尼大悲導師，往昔之時誓願如是，於極穢惡五濁佛剎，
translation: The great compassionate teacher Śākyamuni the Bhagavat, the great compassionate Guide of the World-honored One, has in the past vowed to do so at the most defiled and unwholesome of all buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，作逆眾生誹謗妙法謗無聖人，具不善根惡行相應心相續成就者，
translation: Attaining anuttarii samyaksarrzbodhi, someone who acts contrary to sentient beings and denigrates the wonderful Dharma and denigrates no sages, possesses unwholesome roots and bad mental states associated with bad actions, and

source_sentence: 普令出過三惡道故，成熟三乘故，修忍三昧陀羅尼故，引向清淨諸佛剎土，
translation: Because they cause all to leave the three evil destinies, because they mature the three vehicles, and because they cultivate patience, concentration, and spells of enlightenment, they lead them toward the pure buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 令三寶種久住不斷，成就大願，斷除一切穢濁佛剎，成滿一切功德莊嚴。
translation: He causes the seeds of the Three Treasures to abide for a long time without stopping, accomplishes great vows, removes all defiled buddha-lands, and becomes fully adorned with all merits.

source_sentence: 「是故，我等當如是作，為令如來正教久住，及妙正法得不滅壞。
translation: “Therefore, we should do so in order to cause the Tathāgata’s true teaching to abide for a long time. The wonderful true-dharma also attains and does not perish.

source_sentence: 若今現在、若未來世，無有若魔、若魔眷屬，於如來所受正法欲滅壞隱沒，
translation: In the present and in the future, there is no Māra or any of its associates who want to destroy the true teaching received by the enlightened one but hide it.

source_sentence: 乃至不能惱一眾生，唯除少隨順不具信者。
translation: It doesn't disturb a single sentient being, except for those who rarely follow it and don't have faith.

source_sentence: 若持此妙法者、隨順此法者、說此法者、聽此法者，比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷，
translation: If someone who upholds this wonderful teaching, follows it, explains it, and listens to it, monks, nuns, laymen, and laywomen will be likewise.

source_sentence: 及餘信心善男子、善女人，勤修三業能自策勤，坐禪誦經營理塔寺，恒勤作福，
translation: Good men and good women of other faith who diligently cultivate the three activities can themselves encourage diligence, sit in meditation, recite, operate religious shrines, and always strive to perform meritorious deeds.

source_sentence: 勤事供養佛法僧寶，勤斷三界煩惱繫縛，勤斷一切眾生諸苦，悉令解脫者。

translation: Those who act as causes of disturbed minds because it's for their sake that I now presently invite the Bhagavān to give me the power to accomplish good actions, out of pity for me.

translation: All those who have come to these buddha-lands and the great congregations are there for the benefit of sentient beings, because Buddhism’s true teaching can abide for a long time.

source_sentence: 當憐愍我，今欲說呪與我成就。
translation: You must have pity for me, and now I want to explain the dhāraṇī that you've accomplished with me.

source_sentence: 「若魔、若魔眷屬，欲惱彼等人及法者，我當降伏令其心亂、令其身苦、令身惱縮退失神通，
translation: “If Māra or any of his followers want to harm those people and the teachings, I will subdue them so that their minds will be disturbed, their bodies will be pained, and their torments will shrink and regress.

source_sentence: 故說此呪句。
translation: That's why they say this dhāraṇī phrase.

translation: If there are villages, cities, towns, kingdoms, palaces, boundaries, and quiet places wherever they are located, this teaching will reveal and discern them.

source_sentence: 若於此等起破壞心，乃至一剎那，於彼諸方鬪諍疫死，飢儉諸病，他方怨敵，
translation: If they give rise to thoughts of harmfulness in regard to these, even for an instant, fighting, epidemics, death, hunger, disease, and enemies in other directions will occur.

translation: Nothing can be done, nothing can be lifted, and the five fetters bind it so that it sees for itself, up to all its limbs are twisted and unable to stretch.

source_sentence: 不去魔說是呪時，於剎那頃，由得一切智擁護故，諸魔境界悉皆滅壞無所成就。
translation: When the Māra doesn't go away and explain this spell, it's because he attains the embrace of omniscience that all demonic objects cease and disintegrate without accomplishing anything at any time.

source_sentence: 如是，如是，所有欲作不利益者，皆不成果。
translation: Thus, thus, and so forth, all those who want to do anything that's not beneficial won't attain it.

source_sentence: 是時，一切諸佛世尊，咸共稱讚：「善哉！
translation: All the buddhas and world-honored ones then praised them all, saying, Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！」
translation: Excellent!

source_sentence: 及一切菩薩摩訶薩、天龍、夜叉、人、非人等，亦共稱讚：「善哉！
translation: All the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, gods, dragons, yakṣas, humans, non-humans, and so forth also praised it, saying, Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！」
translation: Excellent!

source_sentence: 是時，大地皆大震動，四海涌沸，諸須彌山王，魔及眷屬悉大驚動。
translation: At that time the whole earth trembled and the four seas inundated, and Mount Sumeru, the king of mountains, Māra, and their retinues were all greatly frightened.

source_sentence: 是時惡鬼神等亦復如是，唯除於佛教法清淨信者，及得忍菩薩不生驚怖。
translation: At that point, bad spirits and so forth are likewise, except for those who have pure faith in the Buddhist teachings and bodhisattvas who attain patience and don't become frightened.

source_sentence: 爾時，魔王問堅固慧菩薩言：「善男子！
translation: It was then that the demon king asked the Bodhisattva of Steadfast Wisdom, Good man!

source_sentence: 何等因緣，此不去魔有是勝力？
translation: What's the reason this doesn't go to Māra with such superior power?

source_sentence: 是誰加彼？
translation: Who adds them to it?

source_sentence: 此無慈悲，令我部黨及我境界力之所作，一切散滅悉皆退壞；
translation: This absence of compassion causes our sects and factions, as well as the deeds of the power of my objective realm, all to disperse and disintegrate.

source_sentence: 乃更建立沙門瞿曇，黑黨親眷說斷惡見。
translation: He then established the ascetic Gautama, a black group of relatives who said to cut off bad views.

source_sentence: 我即聞此陀羅尼時，令我身體臭惡爛壞無所能為，一切諸方為我黑闇，
translation: When I hear this dhāraṇī, it will cause my body to smell bad and disintegrate without doing anything, and all directions will be dark for me.

source_sentence: 不見諸光大熱所燒耶！」
translation: Don't you see the light burned by the great heat!

source_sentence: 爾時，堅固菩薩答魔王言：「此是一切諸佛世尊神力加護，亦是一切人、非人等，
translation: At that point, the resolute bodhisattva answered the king of Māra, saying, This is the protection of all the buddhas and world-honored ones by their supernormal powers, and it's also the protection of all people and non-people.

source_sentence: 與此不去魔力故，令汝等一切諸魔境界之力，如所欲作悉皆摧碎。
translation: Because of this power of not going to the realm of Māra, you will be destroyed by the power of all these realms of Māra in whatever way you wish.

source_sentence: 今說此不退陀羅尼句時，汝今應生清淨信心，於如來所，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
translation: Now, when you explain this nonretrogressing dhāraṇī phrase, you should now give rise to pure faith and give rise to the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment at the Tathāgata's place.

source_sentence: 汝今若能如是作者，此身口意諸苦惱觸悉當解脫。」
translation: If you can now do so, this body, speech, and painful sensations will all be liberated.

source_sentence: 是時，魔王答堅固菩薩言：「我今寧當忍耐此苦，令身口意受於無量無數大苦惱事，
translation: The lord of Māra answered the Bodhisattva Steadfast, saying: “I should endure this suffering so that my body, speech, and mind will experience immeasurable, incalculable, great pain and distress.

source_sentence: 至於最後邊際劫，我終不發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。」
translation: As for the final eon, I'll never give rise to the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.
